name: Size Extension Mets SSF1 AJCC6 - M
title: Size Extension Mets SSF1 AJCC 6 Table - M
subtitle: CS SSF1 010 or 040 with CS Mets at DX and CS Tumor Size
notes: **Note**:  When CS Site-Specific Factor 1 is coded 010 or 040, separate tumor nodules in same lobe or unknown if in same lobe, the values of T and M for AJCC 6 staging are assigned on the basis of CS Tumor Size and CS Mets at DX as shown in this table.  CS Site-Specific Factor 1 codes 010 and 040 map to T4 in AJCC 6 staging.  CS Tumor Size code 998 maps to M1.
